episodes.title: The Ant Hill Kid Cult | Ep191
episodes.description: This cult was a religious group led by Roch Thériault in Quebec, Canada, during the 1970s and 1980s. Thériault claimed to be a prophet and convinced his followers to isolate themselves from society. The cult engaged in extreme practices, including physical and psychological abuse, violence, and disturbing ritualsCase Starts at 3:00https://morbidology.com/the-ant-hill-kids/https://allthatsinteresting.com/ant-hill-kidshttps://www.cultfacts.com/cults/ant-hill-kidshttps://maryboro.ca/story/roch-theriault-and-the-ant-hill-kids/https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/us-news/chilling-insight-doomsday-cult-members-13995059https://medium.com/@filiphristovreligion/the-ant-hill-kids-in-about-100-words-4b5f2cb95b31https://zeph456.medium.com/the-ant-hill-kids-c85d46a1eb2aSupport the showCLICK HERE FOR ALL OF OUR INFORMATION!^ MERCH, FB Links, All important links!! ^🚨Patreon JesusLovesYou Apparel - Use Code: WORLDWIDE for 15% off ▪️Case Suggestion form ▪️Victims Advocacy form▪️Listener Tale Submission form▪️Facebook Group▪️Instagram: @Bookedbaggedandtagged- Tiktok @BookedBaggedandtagged_______Track: "Done Bought It"Music provided by https://slip.streamFree Download / Stream: https://get.slip.stream/uQ845uhttps://tunetank.com/track/296-happy-morning/------Disclaimer: The views and opinions expressed in this episode are personal and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any other agency, organization, employer or company.
